price: Akasema: Basi nyinyi mnawaabudu asiye kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu wasio kufaini kitu wala kukudhuruni?
arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ
footnotes: Ibrahim akasema: Ikiwa hali yao haya masanamu ni hii, hayawezi kitu, na nyinyi ndio makhusiano yenu nao ni hivi, basi nyinyi mmekuwa mnaacha kumuabudu Mwenyezi Mungu, na badala yake mnaabudu vitu visivyo kupeni faida hata chembe mkiviabudu, wala havikudhuruni kwa lolote mkiviachilia mbali?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla afataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿukum shayan walā yaḍurrukum
